text: The Enchanted Boy () is a 1955 Soviet animated movie directed by Vladimir Polkovnikov and Aleksandra Snezhko-Blotskaya.Мультфильмы Александра Петрова вошли в сотню лучших по РоссииЗаколдованный мальчик == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1955 movies Category:1950s animated movies Category:Soviet animated movies
title: The Enchanted Boy
